head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, LAWRENCE F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, LAWRENCE F.

block.p: MURPHY--Lawrence F. January 6, 2007, beloved husband of Kay, loving brother of John, devoted uncle of 22 nieces and nephews. A long time employee of the NY Times who later practiced law on Long Island, NY. Former President and General Counsel for the AMCEA. Friends may call Tuesday January 9, 2-5pm and 7-9pm at Frank E. Campbell 1076. Madison Ave at 81st NYC. Mass of Christian Burial Wed. 10 am at St. Ignatius church, Park Ave. at 84 St.
